attributes.action: Reduce the cost of healthy wholefoods like fruits, vegetables and lean meats.
attributes.additional_details:
Please help us to eat better by making healthy food more affordable to those of us on low income. 

We're not talking about low fat processed foods laden with hidden sugars. We're talking about real food like fruit, vegetables, lean meats, nuts, beans and fish. 

Healthy foods that are full of vitamins and antioxidants. 

Help us to help others to help themselves. 

By reducing the cost of real food we can feed our children better. This will contribute to healthier minds & bodies for the future.
attributes.background:
In the UK it costs more to buy real healthy good quality nutritious food than it does to buy junk processed food. 
The obesity epidemic in the UK is partly to do with not being able to afford proper food and relying on cheap processed food to fill us. 
Whole food shopping can cost around double.
